channel.title: Question on JDK 6u7
channel.description:
Did i do something wrong? I just went to Sun Microsystems to download Java Development Kit, got the download shell, Downloaded it w/ my web browser(Google chrome) and then i did all the steps, registered the product, and when i hit run, a black command prompt comes onto my screen, then disappears in about half a second.
Could anyone steer me in the right direction, or tell me what i did wrong (if i did).
Any help would be greatly appreciated, and I shall repay you somehow, if possible =p.

item.title: Question on JDK 6u7
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:2, topic:230574”]Set your Environmental Variables. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,70709.0.html#post_spac
Change the Java version in the PATH/CLASSPATH to the one you have.[/quote]

I shall try that. CBA to post when im finished. Thanks for replying!

Read full topic

item.title: Question on JDK 6u7
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Set your Environmental Variables. http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,70709.0.html#post_spac
Change the Java version in the PATH/CLASSPATH to the one you have.

Read full topic
